Method.name: GetAddress
Method.Implementation:
///todo столбцы указать явно set SchoolQuery = "SELECT * "_ "FROM LIB.Address where id="_IdAddress
do ##class(SPD.School).GetJSONData(SchoolQuery) ret $$$OK

Method.name: UpdateAddress
Method.Implementation: set st=$$$OK try{ set st=##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ConvertJSONToObject(%request.Content,,.obj,1) set addr=##class(LIB.Address).%OpenId(obj.ID) set addr.Country=$ZCONVERT(obj.Country,"I","UTF8") set addr.City=$ZCONVERT(obj.City,"I","UTF8") set addr.Street=$ZCONVERT(obj.Street,"I","UTF8") set addr.Description=$ZCONVERT(obj.ShortDescr,"I","UTF8") do addr.%Save() } catch ex{ set st=ex.AsStatus() } ret st
